item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
Absolute Software Corporation Logo Absolute Software Corporation is an American-Canadian company that specializes in endpoint security and zero trust security. The company is headquartered in Vancouver, British Columbia, Canada and Austin, Texas, with regional offices in Reading, UK; and Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam. Absolute is a publicly traded company on the Toronto Stock Exchange and Nasdaq. Source
You can download theAbsolutelogo on full-version of the page. ]] >
